text:
ACT SAT Prep Learn how to use proportions to determine the number of pears to use in a salad

[imath] \mathbf{O} [/imath]\nJohn wants to make a fruit salad. re He has a recipe that serves 6 people and uses 4 oranges, 5 pears,\n10 apples, 2 orange juices. If you want to serve eighteen people, how many pears will John need?
